mapper.sql: WRKFM_ID, PLAN_ID, TENANT_ID, PROVINCE_ID, HANDLE_DURATION, ACTUAL_HANDLE_DURATION, POOL_STATUS, OPERATE_STAFF_ID, OPERATE_TIME, STAFF_ID, DEPART_ID, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, CUSTOMER_CITY, CUSTOMER_LEVEL, BUSINESS_TYPE, CUSTOMER_BRAND, CHECK_STAFF_NAME, TEMPLATE_ID, PROJECT_TYPE, MARKETING_RESULT, CRT_TIME, MODF_TIME, SRV_REQST_TYPE_ID, SRV_REQST_TYPE_NM, SRV_REQST_TYPE_FULL_NM, CHECK_LINK, RESERVE_1, RESERVE_2, RESERVE_3, RESERVE_4, RESERVE_5, WRKFM_SHOW_SWFTNO, BIZ_CNTT, BIZ_TITLE, CUST_EMAIL, CUST_NAME, CUST_NUM, ARC_TIME, ACPT_STAFF_ID, ACPT_STAFF_NUM, DSPS_COMPLTE_STAFF_ID, IS_OPERATE, CHECK_STAFF_ID, CHECKED_STAFF_ID, CHECKED_STAFF_NAME, CITY_ID
mapper.select: select PLAN_NAME planName from t_qm_plan where PLAN_ID is not null and PLAN_ID = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update t_qm_workform_pool set CHECK_STAFF_ID =
when #{item} then null
,CHECK_STAFF_NAME =
when #{item} then null
,IS_OPERATE =
when #{item} then "0"
,OPERATE_TIME =
when #{item.wrkfmShowSwftno} then null
,POOL_STATUS =
when #{item} then 0
where WRKFM_SHOW_SWFTNO in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_qm_workform_pool
POOL_STATUS = #{poolStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHECK_STAFF_ID = #{checkStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_STAFF_NAME = #{checkStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_OPERATE = #{isOperate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where WRKFM_ID = #{wrkfmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_qm_workform_pool set CHECK_STAFF_NAME = #{checkStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_STAFF_ID = #{checkStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, POOL_STATUS = #{poolStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_OPERATE = #{isOperate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where WRKFM_ID = #{wrkfmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_qm_workform_pool set CHECK_STAFF_ID =
when #{item.wrkfmShowSwftno} then #{item.checkStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
,CHECK_STAFF_NAME =
when #{item.wrkfmShowSwftno} then #{item.checkStaffName,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
,OPERATE_TIME =
when #{item.wrkfmShowSwftno} then now()
,POOL_STATUS =
when #{item.wrkfmShowSwftno} then 0
,IS_OPERATE =
when #{item.wrkfmShowSwftno} then "1"
where WRKFM_SHOW_SWFTNO in
#{item.wrkfmShowSwftno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_qm_workform_pool
order by ${orderByClause}
